commentBody: Talk about misdirection. Yeah. Winning. Cheating. Whatever it takes. Two days later we find out the Patriots chichanery machine is still active: headsets on Kansas City's sidelines didn't work properly during the first part of the game. Mike Tomlin, care to comment? And where does the New England-centric NYTimes report this news? In an article about coin tosses. http://www.nytimes.com/2016/01/18/sports/football/second-coin-toss-was-r.... Here's to flipping (off) the Pats; Brady v Manning in the AFC Championship. Makes for a story. Not a true one, but stories none-the-less.
